title: Clock freeze in champselect new client
body: How do I fix this when RITO obviously doesnt give a shit! Its been there over 1 year now.

replies.body: I totes give a shit, but I don't understand what your issue is.  What do you mean by clock freeze?  Do you mean the timer when selecting champions?  Give me some more details, and I'd be happy to help!
Yes the timer when banning or selecting champs...I cant pick or ban and  then I get dodging penalty. Ive read 1.000.000 other threads about this issue....but still no solution.

Surely one of those threads has had something.  :/  In any case, it sounds like your connection losing sync with champion select and getting left behind entirely.  You'll want to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and fix up any instability with your network.  That should do the trick!

Nope...I dont wanna go over all those steps...I want RITO to fix this bug or let me know exactly what to do to fix it.

The timer freeze at 0 and nothing happens I cant do nothing and leaves me with a doge penalty.

I also have 10+ other issues with the new client not working prporly.

1 for example is when I start searching for a game and want to cancel that doesnt work? I click the button cancel but nothing happens.....you wanna hear 99 more?

The steps have been provided, if you select not to go over them that's entirely your call.  As much as I wish I had a magic wand to fix it automatically, the reality calls for some legwork.  Best of luck!
